00014  * además de definir si el plugin requiere de validación remota o local (oauth)
00015  */
00016 class Plugins_Flickr_Auth extends Common_Auth
00017 {
00018     private $_data;
00019     private $_config;
00020 
00021     private $_client;
00022 
00023     /**
00024      * @return void
00025      */
00026     function __construct()
00027     {
00028         // Call the Model constructor
00029         parent::__construct();
00030 
00031         $this->_ci->config->load('apikeys', TRUE);
00032         $this->_config = $this->_ci->config->item('flickr', 'apikeys');
00033 
00034         $this->_ci->load->library("phpFlickr");
00035         $this->_ci->phpflickr->initialize($this->_config);
00036         
00037         $this->_client = $this->_ci->phpflickr;
00038     }
00039 
00040     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00041      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#hasRemoteAuth()
00042      */
00043     public function hasRemoteAuth()
00044     {
00045         return true;
00046     }
00047 
00048     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00049      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#remoteAuth()
00050      */
00051     public function remoteAuth()
00052     {
00053         $this->_client->auth("write", false);
00054     }
00055 
00056     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00057      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#setData($data)
00058      */
00059     public function setData($data)
00060     {
00061          $this->_data = $data;
00062     }
00063 
00064     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00065      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#getData()
00066      */
00067     public function getData()
00068     {
00069         return $this->_data;
00070     }
00071 
00072     /* (non-PHPdoc)
00073      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Auth#validate()
00074      */
00075     public function validate()
00076     {
00077         if (!isset($this->_data["frob"])) {
00078 
00079             return "Acceso denegado";
00080         }
00081 
00082         $token = $this->_client->auth_getToken($this->_data['frob']);
00083 
00084         if (isset($token["token"])) {
00085         
00086             $this->setData(serialize($token));
00087             return true;
00088 
00089         }
00090 
00091         return "Se produjo un error";
00092     }
00093 }
